channel.title: Ownagescape [508] v2!
channel.description:
[b]Hey and welcome to my second 508 ive made! It's not one of the best 508's but it's a good one to be coded and made better :D
The server includes...
* Bounty Hunter * Mage * Drag area * Godwars * Training area * Yelling * Pm And a bit more...
Stuff that i will fix and add in v3...
* Finish off the shops * Add Drops (No spawning stuff like Armadyl godswords or Dragon Fire Shields) * More skills such as summoning * Fix range And more (I hope) XD
Here's some pictures of the server so far...[/b][/b]
[IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/Welcomescreen.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/Draglair.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/Godwars.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/Homearea.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/Train-1.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/YellandPm.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/bh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i328.photobucket.com/albums/l335/lololol73/trainwelcome.jpg[/img]
[b][b]As you can see it's not too great but ill try to make alot better in v3!
Download link... http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=3144a4d2952347a9d9d5c56d04dfa8b0e04e75f6e8ebb871
Credits... Gods Army/Xeloader/Xelosoft Ownage time/Me
Thanks for reading and Enjoy![/b][/b]

item.title: Ownagescape [508] v2!
item.dc:creator: @tehfury15 tehfury15
item.description:
@tehfury15 wrote:

Can you please explain it in more detail…[br][br][size=1]Posted on: February 27, 2009, 04:26:43 pm[/size][hr]@echo off
cd …/bin
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_6\bin\java.exe” palidino76/rs2/Server 43594
pause

thats what i have what do i change it to…if i the newest java

Read full topic

item.title: Ownagescape [508] v2!
item.dc:creator: @ownage_time ownage time
item.description:
@ownage_time wrote:

[quote=“tehfury15, post:22, topic:264434”]i get the message “The system cannot find the path specified.”
when i try running run.cmd.

How do i properly run the server?[/quote]I’ve been asked this question in a Pm all you have to do is right click the Run.cmd and click edit you shud see some number with 04 at the end change the 04 to your Java version =P

Read full topic

item.title: Ownagescape [508] v2!
item.dc:creator: @ownage_time ownage time
item.description:
@ownage_time wrote:

[b]Hey and welcome to my second 508 ive made!
It’s not one of the best 508’s but it’s a good one to be coded and made better

The server includes…

  • Bounty Hunter
  • Mage
  • Drag area
  • Godwars
  • Training area
  • Yelling
  • Pm
    And a bit more…

Stuff that i will fix and add in v3…

  • Finish off the shops
  • Add Drops (No spawning stuff like Armadyl godswords or Dragon Fire Shields)
  • More skills such as summoning
  • Fix range
    And more (I hope) XD

Here’s some pictures of the server so far…[/b][/b]

Welcomescreen.jpg774×537

Draglair.jpg774×537

Godwars.jpg773×536

Homearea.jpg771×538

Train-1.jpg773×535


bh.jpg771×538

trainwelcome.jpg773×537

[b][b]As you can see it’s not too great but ill try to make alot better in v3!

Download link… http://www.mediafire.com/?sharekey=3144a4d2952347a9d9d5c56d04dfa8b0e04e75f6e8ebb871

Credits…
Gods Army/Xeloader/Xelosoft
Ownage time/Me

Thanks for reading and Enjoy![/b][/b]
